Header.BadgeTextKodiak: $HONEY trading is now live on Mainnet! READ THE ANNOUNCEMENT BLOG
Header.BadgeTextPancake: Need help understanding how to use CLAMM?

NoData.Heading: Your PNL performance will appear here

Banner.Body: Participate in the xSYK ecosystem. Start by converting SYK, redeem your xSYK and manage your xSYK plugins allocations.

Convert.Heading: Get xSYK
Convert.Body: Convert your SYK to xSYK to unlock bonus rewards via staking & more.

Redeem.Heading: Redeem SYK
Redeem.Body: Redeem your SYK from xSYK over a cliff vesting period of 7 days (1 -> 0.5 ratio) or ~6 months (1 -> 1 ratio).

CancelDialog.Title: Cancel Redeem
CancelDialog.Body: By opting to cancel this active redemption, you will restart the entire process. You will retrieve your {xSykAmount} xSYK, but you will not get any SYK.

Staking.Heading: Stake your xSYK
Staking.Body: Stake your xSYK to earn rewards. Real yield through trading fees.

Voting.Heading: Vote using xSYK
Voting.Body: Vote on gauges using xSYK. To ensure more rewards are distributed to the gauges you support.

EmptyTables.Vests: Your vested xSYK positions will appear here.

Banner.Body: Stake your xSYK to earn rewards. To learn more about xSYK, check out our quick links.
